attributes.action: SAVE THE MOTTINGHAM COMMUNITY AND LEARNING SHOP!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe, the closure/reduction of hours at the Mottingham Community and Learning Shop will seriously damage the wellbeing of the community. This invaluable facility was used by 6500 in 2006, and more than 140 Qualifications gained. This disadvantaged area has seen many positive changes in its local community and is a lifeline to many local residents. Due to proposed cutbacks to regular funding, the fate of Mottingham Community and Learning shop isnt looking good. Please help!
